Welcome to imbalanced-ensemble documentation!Â¶


Date: May 19, 2021 Version: 0.1.0

Imbalanced-ensemble (import as :mod:imbalanced_ensemble) is an open source, MIT-licensed Python toolbox for ensemble imbalanced learning. It was built on the basis of scikit-learn and imbalanced-learn.
